review: Great experience. Started with a call for carry out. Took my order perfectly.  Rolled up and they came right out to my truck.  Paid and got a nice fresh salad.  Shrimp cooked just right. Great flavor overall. This Applebee's gets it. I surprised her with a great tip. Love great service.

Lettuce in my salad was wilted, brown and included rotting leaves. Unimpressed.  They offered to take it off my bill - but as it was a substitute for the mashed potato side in my entree it's not like that is truly a credit is it?  Server seemed apologetic.

What is an "applebee". Overall it is defined in character by friendly service. The water overfloweth with suspicious lemons, even if one asks to leave them out. The $10 steak chews like a $3 and they might mix up an order of chicken tenders, but they'll always apologize and flash you a smile. And you still can't beat 2 for $20.
Foods are well flavored, reasonable quantities and reasonably priced.  Our servers were polite, friendly and prompt.  Kinda like dinner at home w/o the cooking.
Great service.  The pretzels and beer cheese is amazing. The remodel looks nice and the atmosphere is great.
